show_name: Di Gi Charat - A Trip to the Planet (movie)
other_title: Di Gi Charat Hoshi no Tabi (Japanese)
デ・ジ・キャラット 星の旅 (Japanese)
plot: Dejiko decided to take a vacation and visit her home, Planet Di Gi Charat, together with Puchiko, Gema, and (accidentally) Rabi~en~Rose. However, Piyoko and her minions would not let go this chance to capture her.
ending_theme: "PARTY☆NIGHT (Movie version)" by Asami Sanada, Miyuki Sawashiro, and Kyoko Hikami
